website_summaries.verdict: A good medium-range speaker upgrade if you're looking for a subwoofer to use as your first major aftermarket purchase.
pros: A good amount of durability comes from the simple and hefty speaker construction
Can take a lot of abuse from typical car use such as food, spills, and dust that collect over time
Easy to connect to existing amplifier
cons: Bulkier speaker exterior makes it a little more challenging to install in some vehicles

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: So incredible! Just buy it, you'll never look back! I'm a huge audiophile. I own a 40k theater for my home and expect high quality for my car. No joke I drive a Miata and have this 10inch glorious sound machine in my trunk and my goodness is it completely insane!! The dynamic range is unreal for the price. It's an absolute steal. Don't think twice. It's an absolute delight to the senses!
customer_reviews.author: Projector Guy

customer_reviews.title: Buy these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I started off buying speakers that were half the cost... big mistake. I bought these and they are awesome. Great sound in a convertible. I recommend these 10s to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent subs, stop shopping around
customer_reviews.text: First, I'm a sound system designer and installer that's been out of the game for a little while. I picked up a new convertible and was looking for a 10" that could get a lot done in a small sealed box w/o breaking the bank. Picked up two of these and gave them about .93 cu ft each with a Rockford Fosgate R500X1D Prime 1-Channel Class D Amplifier running them. There was a break-in period and they definitely stepped up their game after a few weeks. Its been about 2 years now and no complaints. Actually, I'm considering adding a second amp to push these even harder. Stop shopping and get that system started.
customer_reviews.author: Vegas Don

customer_reviews.title: Two of these wired 2 ohm handles 650 watts RMS...
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of Pioneer TS-W254R but they couldn't quite handle myand started to stink. I replaced them with these and it's a great match. These REALLY drop the beat with the help of an.
customer_reviews.author: Your public name

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: I’m running two with 600 watts RMS and they hit plenty hard in my Vette

customer_reviews.title: great speaker, very powerful sound
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the Sub in my home theater with this and it is amazing.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, gives me just enough bass in my Ford. Definitely worth the price, would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: The price is just right!
customer_reviews.text: This sub will not disappoint you. It hit, you can feel it and I’m only running one. It makes my expedition shake.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Great Woofer!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic upgrade from my previous Pioneer 10 that I pushed too hard. This one sounds sooooo much better. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: WillTHEthrill

customer_reviews.title: Good budget buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for a budget system setup. Would buy again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Reid Houser

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped working about a week after use. Used on a 500 watt amp only.
customer_reviews.author: Lopdrop

customer_reviews.title: I should of bought just one
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, they were placed in a 06 silverado extended cab, in a Bbox under the seat box down firing, powered by the pioneer 8601 monoblock 1600 watt amp I can't even stand it wayyyyyyyyy to much bass great products thankyou pioneer
customer_reviews.author: C Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good sub
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Just have to tweak my EQ to get the right base when I get a chance.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent subwoofer being powered by 250 watts in a sealed box. Love it!!

customer_reviews.title: So much better then kicker had a 10in kicker it blew so ...
customer_reviews.text: So much better then kicker had a 10in kicker it blew so I got this and holy crap no comparison

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Sounded bad since day one and popped non stop then stopped working .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding sub.
customer_reviews.text: This looks like a decent and well engineered product. I am driving this with an Alpine MRV-M500. It is installed in a Goldwood TR10F .7 cubic foot sealed box that I bought from Parts Express for around 20$ with a handful of acoustic matting thrown in. It sounds great, nice tight thump with excellent lows. I think it was a pretty decent bargain. I do feel that I am fussy... and it has made me happy so far(had it maybe a month so far..) I replaced a Polk DB1040 that failed after only 11 months with no abuse...I hope this brand/product holds up better.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Value, Punchy
customer_reviews.text: I'm running this sub In my f250 on around 300w rms from a old school usacoustics usx2080 amp. Id be hard pressed to tell the difference from my Ranger's IDynamics on a 500w rms Kenwood class d. I listen to rock and country these days... (Im a Old school Bass Head) I needed a punchy kick in my arse this did it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazombie

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought a second one for the garage
customer_reviews.text: So good I bought a second one for the garage. Take your time and break it in easy, low power for a while, and after about 15-20 hours you can start laying into it with some heavy stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Single speaker paired with a Rockford Fosgate R500X1D Class D amp in a custom 1.1 Cu Foot Band Pass box in a 2017 Honda Ridgeline. Haven't built a good car system in 25+ years and was pleasantly surprised at how low and clean the bass was.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoPilot

customer_reviews.title: And it's good quality sound too
customer_reviews.text: This sub pound in my car! Installed in a sealed box, my whole car thumps. And it's good quality sound too. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Tyrone Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Good if you’re going cheap for dirty bass
customer_reviews.text: Not bad... I have this in a very narrow truck box mounted the opposite way (inverted) for more air volume. I must say, I was surprised at how well this does.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great sub. I have 2 hooked to a pioneer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sub. I have 2 hooked to a pioneer champion series 2400 watt amp. Perfect match. Getting 2 more next month (I like it loud)
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ballard

customer_reviews.text: Awesome sub !! I put it in the Atrend E10Sv B sub box that I also bought on Amazon ....and wow ! Sounds Great for a 10" sub and I just have it hooked up to an older Rockford Fosgate 400 amp. Can't wait to upgrade to a new amp and hear it then.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Parker

customer_reviews.title: when Pioneer say Pro series, they back up what they say
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Had 12's and loved them! Son, needed something smaller, but with the same punch! I/We went with 10s, very satisfied, Quality subwoofers .
